item.title: Using open source software to help technology transition of research
item.description: If you’re doing software research and development (especially on how to improve computer security), and are thinking about using an open source software (OSS) approach but don’t know a lot about it, here’s something that may help: Using an Open Source Software Approach for Cybersecurity Technology Transition (IDA paper P-5279, aka the “PI guide”). If you’re an old hand at developing Free/ libre/ open source software (FLOSS or OSS), you probably know most of this information. However, I’ve found that a lot of people could use a hand. Here’s that helping hand.
